00298   void setDynamicContactForce(const vec3 &force) {
00299     dynamicForce[0] = force.x(); dynamicForce[1] = force.y();dynamicForce[2] = force.z();
00300         dynamicForce[3] = dynamicForce[4] = dynamicForce[5] = 0;
00301   }

00551 /* just like what VirtualContact class has done, VirtualContactOnObject Class is nothing weird except that
00552 it changes the virtual contacts' loaction from the finger to an object imported before.
00553 with these virtual contacts, we continue to study the grasp quality. Hao 10.04
00554 */
00555 class VirtualContactOnObject : public VirtualContact
00556 {
00557 public:
00558         VirtualContactOnObject ();
00559         ~VirtualContactOnObject ();
00560         void readFromFile(FILE * fp);
00561         void writeToFile(FILE * fp);
00562 };
